name: Pyramid Gems
description:
Follow me on Twitter https://twitter.com/BaptisteVillain or on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/VillainGames

Simple, tricky, retro. 

This unique gameplay is inspired by games like picross, jabeh or even crosswords... with numbers.

Red, blue or green? Make your choice, quick!

Get ready to beat 99 levels, crafted by the Pharaoh. Use your gems and reveal the mysteries... or maybe it's just funny trophies that will animate in game.
Once you have explored some chapters, you will be able to play in relax mode for a less stressed experience 'on-the-go'.

For any question, support, contact me via social networks or by mail villain.baptiste(at)hotmail.fr

The game is also available on mobiles:
